---
category: news
title: "Waymo shares new details about its autonomous vehicle simulation efforts"
excerpt: "Driver autonomous driving AI is covering about 20 million miles a day on virtual roads. That’s the equivalent of about 100 years’ worth in the real world. Waymo uses these virtual road trips to hone Driver’s navigation capabilities and expose the system to new scenarios it may have to face in the future when ferrying passengers on public roads."
